about_the_game:
The free “Stellar Prisoner” update features an exciting new quest involving a mysterious prisoner trapped in a neutron star, along with a variety of new content, modding tools and AI improvements.

The Stellar Prisoner Update includes


  • The Neutron Star, a brand new vibrant battle arena that provides bonuses to players who control this special node.

  • A new "Invisible Chains" quest triggered upon the discovery of the Neutron Star.

  • Tiaych Zhilleaq, a new Endless Virtual hero.

  • Koros Apogee, a new Cravers Prime hero, unlocked by the community during the E.N.F.E.R. Alternate Reality Game.

  • Two new unique planets to discover, Veil and Teonha!

This update also includes numerous modding improvements like the ability to edit visuals (hero, quests, events) and textures (planets, ships) along with various AI improvements.
detailed_description:
The free “Stellar Prisoner” update features an exciting new quest involving a mysterious prisoner trapped in a neutron star, along with a variety of new content, modding tools and AI improvements.

The Stellar Prisoner Update includes


  • The Neutron Star, a brand new vibrant battle arena that provides bonuses to players who control this special node.

  • A new "Invisible Chains" quest triggered upon the discovery of the Neutron Star.

  • Tiaych Zhilleaq, a new Endless Virtual hero.

  • Koros Apogee, a new Cravers Prime hero, unlocked by the community during the E.N.F.E.R. Alternate Reality Game.

  • Two new unique planets to discover, Veil and Teonha!

This update also includes numerous modding improvements like the ability to edit visuals (hero, quests, events) and textures (planets, ships) along with various AI improvements.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.11 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 775M | Radeon HD 6970 | Intel Iris Pro
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720

name: ENDLESS™ Space 2 - Stellar Prisoner Update

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 4th generation / i5 2nd generation / A6 series
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 / AMD Radeon 5800 series / NVidia 550Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution: 1280 x 720
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: i3 5th generation (or newer) / i5 3rd generation (or newer) / FX4170 (or newer)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 8000 series or newer / NVidia GTX 660 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: Recommended Resolution: 1920 x 1080

short_description: The free “Stellar Prisoner” Update features new heroes, new planets, a new quest and a new star, along with a variety of modding and AI improvements.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
